title: Black screen on the old launcher
body:
When i open the launcher I dont get the orange play button, I just get an empty screen with the "x" at top right along with the minimize and I get the LoL logo in the top left corner. 

I've tried reinstalling everything and I have disabled the antivirus. Nothing works. And I had the same issue with the new client but instead of the Black screen i got the new logo and a loop just going around infinitely. 

Now that I have deleted everything and installed the launcher again I can only open the old client and it doesnt work. Help please.

replies.body:
Hey, John

I solved the problem. It may be related to the proxy. See the video below. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bi3Fle4omF0
Same here for me. I only see a black screen at login page. Any one can help to solve it?

This black screen may actually be a problem having a strong connection to our servers, so it can't download assets.  Re-install won't necessarily resolve this, so I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide instead to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
